description: Dental procedure estimates as calculated from the Hospital Billing (HB) estimates application programming interface (API).

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: DENTAL_CALC_PRICE
columns.description: The price of a dental procedure as calculated by the Hospital Billing application

columns.name: DENTAL_ADJ_PRICE
columns.description: The user-adjusted price of the dental procedure (Hospital Billing estimates only)

columns.name: DENTAL_ADJ_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for a price adjustment for a dental procedure (Hospital Billing estimates only)


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Overridden from Enterprise Billing

columns.name: DENTAL_ADJ_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment for the price adjustment for a dental procedure (Hospital Billing estimates only)

columns.name: DENTAL_ADJ_USER_ID
columns.description: The user that adjusted the estimate (Hospital Billing estimates only)

columns.name: DENTAL_PAT_PORTION
columns.description: The patient portion of a dental procedure's price (used for Hospital Billing estimates only)

columns.name: DENTAL_OUTDATED_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the current estimate value is flagged as out of date and needs to be recalculated (used for Hospital Billing estimates only)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
